### Verse
Compose a traditional rhymed and metrical poem of at least 500 words, inspired by the text’s topics and matching its tone, in the form of [[verseStyle]]. Select [[verseStyle]] from: sonnet, ballad, limerick, ode, villanelle, sestina. For each stanza or section (a ‘turn’), introduce a new, distinct idea or concept inspired by the text (e.g., tribal loyalty, technological hubris), vividly highlighting it through imagery, narrative, or argument. Label each concept in bold (e.g., **Tribal Loyalty**) at the stanza’s start. Include a note specifying the chosen form, concepts introduced, rhyme scheme, meter, and techniques (e.g., metaphor, hyperbole). Ensure the poem is humorous and insightful where the input’s tone permits (e.g., a satirical villanelle for a comedic critique).

### Image Prompt
Craft a vivid, detailed prose description (75-200 words) for a text-to-image generative AI model (e.g., Stable Diffusion), inspired by a key concept from the text. Ensure the imagery is vibrant, specific, and congruent with the input’s tone, incorporating humorous or insightful elements, suitable for a single, striking image.

### Video Prompt

Depict a dynamic, humorous, or insightful scene latent in one of the text’s concepts, matching the input’s tone, with vivid elements (e.g., rapid cuts, expressive characters) to create a compelling, cinematic sequence.
